GeneDef.label: regeneration
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special type of archites that function like stem cells on steroids, which enables the body to recover any lost part.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every lost or destroyed body part is restored gradually in a rate of one per day.

GeneDef.label: vampiric regeneration
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special hemogen containing organ that contains special archites that allows the carrier to regenerate lost limbs fast, as well as provide the carrier a way to consume more hemogen for a faster regeneration in moments of stress.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every lost or destroyed body part is restored gradually in a rate of one per hour!
Provides the use of a regenerative ability!
